attributes.additional_details: Animals are living creatures and people who neglect their rights should have a longer and tougher sentence. if someone kills another human being they get a long jail term but for animals it much less severe and i think people take advantage of that and do as they please with them so if you sighn my petition we can make a differece for animals all over the world as well as knowing that the people who caused it will be punished as they should be.
